ffmpeg_required: Gawo la `{{module_name}}` limafuna **FFmpeg** kuti ligwire ntchito. Chonde liyikeni kuchokera patsamba lovomerezeka: - [https://ffmpeg.org](https://ffmpeg.org) Ngati simukufuna izi, mutha kuzimitsa gawo ili mu gawo la **Automation Programs**, kapena podina batani lomwe lili pansipa.
